properties.description: This initiative deploys Azure Monitor Baseline Alerts (AMBA-ALZ) to monitor Load Balancing Services such as Load Balancer, Application Gateway, Traffic Manager, and Azure Front Door.
properties.displayName: Deploy Azure Monitor Baseline Alerts (AMBA-ALZ) for Load Balancing

metadata.displayName: AGW Total Time Dynamic Alert Sensitivity

Policy effect for the alert, deployIfNotExists will deploy the alert if it does not exist, disabled will not deploy the alert
